title: How the pandemic changed social media habits
description:
We’re posting more. We’re posting less. And some of us aren’t posting at all anymore. Recode’s Rani Molla explains the past year in social media usage.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: How the pandemic changed social media habits
itunes:author: Recode
itunes:subtitle: Twitter and Instagram usage rose significantly. TikTok’s average monthly visits grew by 576%.
